system.description: This spell functions like teleport, except that it teleports an object (up to 50 lb./level and 3 cu. ft./level), not you. Creatures and magical forces cannot be teleported. The object can be sent to a distant location on the Ethereal Plane; the point of origin remains faintly magical until the item is retrieved. A successful targeted dispel magic on that point brings the item back from the Ethereal Plane.
system.target: One touched object (up to 50 lb./level and 3 cu. ft./level)
